# Playlist.Entry.LibrarySortProperties

**Type Alias**

The associated type that contains the set of playlist entry properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias LibrarySortProperties = LibraryPlaylistEntrySortProperties
```
title: Playlist.Entry.LibrarySortProperties
